Portfolio

Recent Projects

3D Object Scanner using Basic Structured Light Techniques

Developed a 3D scanning system using ESP32-CAM, Line Laser, and a stepper motor to streamline image capture and transmission via WiFi to a dedicated C++ application.

The Desktop Application reconstructs 3D point clouds from an acquired set of discrete images with line laser projection for object reconstruction and an interactive display.

CTIMS Web Interface

Built a web-based 3D viewing & interactive labeling/annotation tool to streamline the creation of annotated 3D data for training deep learning models to process 3D volumes.

This software product is owned by the Smart Energy Systems Lab (SESL) at Ontario Tech University

Founder and CTO | EZCampus

EZCampus integrates many university course databases to create dynamic course scheduling tools, used by 1000+ University Students and Society Members.

Our team consists of 3 core members each specializing in different parts of the system to ultimately bring the app together. As a team, we won first place and a cash prize at the Ontario Tech University’s First-annual Engineering Demo Fest.

general fields of interest (within software)

I'm always curious about new tech!

Full Stack | Web 2.0 Development

From React.js to building API Systems integrated with SQL-Like Databases, to deployment of secure web-applications in production.  

Electronics & Low-Level Systems

Digital & Computer Systems, Micro-controllers & sensor data / signal processing from various hardware modules. IoT Edge devices, such as ESP-32 Microcontrollers communicating via WiFi or RF to Desktop App!

Data Science & A.I Programming

Fascinated with the rapidly moving A.I field (Deep Learning) as well as the classic Statistical Machine Learning techniques. Currently very interested in Computer Vision !

Cross-Platform Applications

Written various C++ and Java Desktop Applications for Windows and Linux. I'm currently interested in using graphic libraries to build game engines, and I've also used Windows WIN32's Windows Sockets Library to create Networking App (TCP protocol)
